title: Albedo
description: This entire piece was done by moving one large stencil around the canvas, and changing the colors as I went along.

title: Reflection
description: This is a nice little painting, done with some rubber cement resist, and a little bit of stenciling.

title: Oasis
description: This is a colorful little piece with a lot of energy and movement. It was fun to do.

title: Nebula
description: This is a small painting with a limited color palette, that is supposed to convey a feeling of lightness and spaciousness.

title: Family Time
description: This is a cheerful little painting, where the figures have been carved out of a patterned background.

title: Sanctuary
description: My goal with this was to see if I could successfully combine acrylic paint with areas of alcohol ink. I knew that the cells created by the ink would look like bubbles, so I decided on a watery theme, done in blues and greens.

title: Replicant
description: This entire piece was done by moving one large stencil around the canvas, and changing the colors as I went along.
